name: Basic Alloy Factory
description: Adds 10% to total Planet Alloy Production

name: Advanced Alloy Factory
description: Adds 20% to total Planet Alloy Production

name: Intelligent Alloy Factory
description: Adds 30% to total Planet Alloy Production

name: Basic Crystal Mine
description: Adds 10% to total Planet Energy Crystal Production

name: Advanced Crystal Mine
description: Adds 20% to total Planet Energy Crystal Production

name: Intelligent Crystal Mine
description: Adds 30% to total Planet Energy Crystal Production

name: Basic Synthetic System
description: Adds 10% to total Planet Intelligent Array Production

name: Advanced Synthetic System
description: Adds 20% to total Planet Intelligent Array Production

name: Intelligent Synthetic System
description: Adds 30% to total Planet Intelligent Array Production

name: Basic Simulation Center
description: Allows 1 simulation point to be used per round per center

name: Advanced Simulation Center
description: Allows 2 simulation point to be used per round per center

name: Intelligent Simulation Center
description: Allows 3 simulation point to be used per round per center

name: Basic Design Center
description: Allows 1 starship design per round per center

name: Advanced Design Center
description: Allows 2 starship design per round per center

name: Intelligent Design Center
description: Allows 4 starship design per round per center

name: Basic Radar Station
description: Scans 10 Radar points to adjacent Systems

name: Advanced Radar Station
description: Scans 20 Radar points to adjacent Systems

name: Intelligent Radar Station
description: Scans 30 Radar points to adjacent Systems

name: Basic Jamming Station
description: Jams 20 Radar points

name: Advanced Jamming Station
description: Jams 40 Radar points

name: Intelligent Jamming Station
description: Jams 60 Radar points

name: Basic Militia Fortress
description: Provides 2 Nuclear Militia Regiments in defence

name: Advanced Militia Fortress
description: Provides 4 Fusion Militia Regiments in defence

name: Intelligent Militia Fortress
description: Provides 6 Plasma Militia Regiments in defence

name: Basic Fleet Academy
description: Trains 1 Starship Cadet per round

name: Advanced Fleet Academy
description: Trains 2 Starship Cadets per round

name: Intelligent Fleet Academy
description: Trains 3 Starship Cadets per round

name: Basic Marine Academy
description: Trains up to 2 Marine Regiments per round

name: Advanced Marine Academy
description: Trains up to 4 Marine Regiments per round

name: Intelligent Marine Academy
description: Trains up to 6 Marine Regiments per round

name: Basic Shipyard
description: Allows for 192 slots worth of Starships to be constructed

name: Advanced Shipyard
description: Allows for 384 slots worth of Starships to be constructed

name: Intelligent Shipyard
description: Allows for 768 slots worth of Starships to be constructed

name: Basic Marine Installation
description: Allows for 200 Marine Points per round

name: Advanced Marine Installation
description: Allows for 400 Marine Points per round

name: Intelligent Marine Installation
description: Allows for 600 Marine Points per round

name: Basic Warp Gate
description: Allows for 5 ships/trade routes to travel though gate per round

name: Advanced Warp Gate
description: Allows for 10 ships/trade routes to travel though gate per round

name: Intelligent Warp Gate
description: Allows for 20 ships/trade routes to travel though gate per round

name: Basic Research Center
description: Allows for 15 points of research per round

name: Advanced Research Center
description: Allows for 20 points of research per round

name: Intelligent Research Center
description: Allows for 30 points of research per round
